name: J.A.Y.D.E.N
description:
Info:

Jayden wakes up in an unknown dream world controlled by a nightmare beast. The only way that they can escape the dream is by beating the creature at its own game, while using an oversized pistol of course. Can Jayden escape the dream and return to reality?

Controls:

WASD - To move

Shift - Dash

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Extra:

This was made for the Brackeys 2022_1 Game Jam! Sorry if its not very good, since this is the first real game I have made. I look forward to hearing feedback however!
